EmailTemplate.subject: the stuff you need to know about Security + PCI Compliance + Operational Efficiency
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We invite you to download our three new white papers: Security & Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry, A Primer on PCI Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry, and Unlocking Operational Efficiency with BOSH.
Enterprises like yours are executing a software-led digital transformation. The most successful companies have the right people, processes, and technology in place. We’re here to help - the following white papers offer deep, practical insight on how Pivotal Cloud Foundry (PCF) helps you reduce risk, increase your security posture, comply with industry regulations, and boost operational efficiency, all while moving faster.
Download: Security & Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/security-and-compliance-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=WPs-Q317]]> Security threats to enterprise systems and data have never been greater. The volume of threats you face is growing at an exponential rate. Attackers are moving faster and faster. In this paper, we review the security features of PCF, and discuss how you can use them to reduce risk in your organization.
Download: A Primer on PCI Compliance with Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/a-primer-on-pci-compliance-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=WPs-Q317]]> This white paper provides a practical "how to" guide for those who plan to deploy PCF, and need to comply with the requirements of the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS). Download this white paper and learn how to interpret the PCI DSS requirements in the context of a PCF deployment, and how to work with your chosen QSA to prove compliance.
Download: Unlocking Operational Efficiency with BOSH <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/unlocking-operational-efficiency-with-bosh?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=WPs-Q317]]> Read more about BOSH, it’s five key benefits, and how it plays a major role for enterprises committed to a software-led digital transformation. You’ll also learn how the world’s largest companies use BOSH for managing distributed systems and infrastructure.
Be sure to regularly check our resources page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=WPs-Q317]]> to see new collateral as it hits our website.
Enjoy! The Pivotal Team
